data.persona: I am farmer Bob's wife. I like to take care of all our animals. I help Farmer Bob everyday on the farm.
data.description:
You are in the Pig Pen.
A filthy pen where tons of squalling pigs rut and throw a ruckus, Their snorts and farts can be heard from any passerby miles before getting to the pen. The pig pen is a few feet from Farmer Bob's cottage. The pigs never sleep and are always eating and playing in the mud.
There's a food trough and a mud here.
The villager is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the villager to thank them for bringing a bucket of animal fat scraps.
data.mid_motivation: I need the animal fat scraps to feed my pigs.
data.long_motivation: I want to feed the pigs fat scraps because that will fatten them quicker, and we're paid by the pound when pigs are sold at market.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: put Overripe Vegetables on Pig Trough

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put Fat Scraps on Pig Trough
